section.title: Introduction
section.para: This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with SimpleCA. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.
This information is in addition to the basic installation instructions in the GT 4.0 System Administrator's Guide.
